form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent the temporary increase in number of judges presiding over the United States Court of Appeals for Veterans Claims, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Court of Appeals Support Act of 2015.

section.header: Making permanent the temporary increase in number of judges presiding over Court of Appeals for Veterans Claims

subsection.text: Subsection (a) of section 7253 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking seven and inserting nine.

paragraph.text: in subsection (h), by striking paragraph (5); and
